messages.pass: Potential savings with image conversion are insignificant
messages.fail: Potential savings are more than 8KB. Collect each BMP, JPEG, and PNG image on the page, and then convert each to WebP. {{=it.data.url}} has {{=Number((it.data.wastedBytes / 1024).toFixed(1)).toLocaleString('en-En')}} KB wasted. {{=it.data.displayValue}} of all images.
